author: , The Post-Crescent
title: See Photos of Northern Lights from Outagamie County
text:
See Photos of Northern Lights from Outagamie County Rashad Alexander , Claire Reid Appleton Post-Crescent Show Caption
Hide Caption
Time lapse video: Northern lights near Milwaukee, Wisconsin See a time lapse video of the northern lights dance across the sky north of Milwaukee, Wisconsin in Bayside on Thursday night. The Northern Lights graced night skies across Wisconsin including across Outagamie County on Thursday night after an eruption of solar material caused the NOAA Space Weather Prediction to issue a severe geomagnetic storm watch .
Watches at this level are very rare. Strong geomagnetic storms can impact infrastructure, potentially disrupting communications, the electric power grid, navigation, radio and satellite operation, NOAA says.
The watch continues into early Saturday morning, so if you missed the Aurora Borealis last night, you still may be able to see them tonight.
If you can't catch the Northern Lights either night, check out these pictures that Appleton and other Outagamie County residents took last night.
Northern lights over Appleton, WI. Never in my life have you been able to see them this vibrant in town with the naked eye.
Posted by Michael Welhouse on Thursday, October 10, 2024 Northern lights over Appleton tonight are awesome
Posted by Ricky Lucy on Thursday, October 10, 2024 Northern lights came out very bright just north of Appleton for a bit. So cool could see them very good with the naked eye. Some of my pics aren't focused the best my camera was a acting up a bit tonight.
Posted by Austin Kealey on Thursday, October 10, 2024 My view of the Northern Lights. ðŸŒ™ðŸ’œ #natureisawesome #magic #northernlights #mybackyard
Posted by Ashley Schmit on Thursday, October 10, 2024 âœ¨Northern Lightsâœ¨ Appleton Wi. #northernlights #appletonwisconsin
Posted by Fatima Marinez Martinez on Thursday, October 10, 2024 Northern lights Appleton, Wisconsin
Posted by John Jacob on Thursday, October 10, 2024 For the first time in my life I saw the Northern Lights last night. ðŸŒŒ Absolutely incredible!
Posted by The Statement Piece LLC on Friday, October 11, 2024 Northern lights #northernlights lights
Posted by Patrick Roeland on Thursday, October 10, 2024 The Northern lights were beautiful over the farm tonight!
Posted by Legacy Rose Farm on Thursday, October 10, 2024 What causes the Northern Lights? Also known as Aurora Borealis, the Northern Lights are a natural light display in Earth's sky that is famously best seen in high-latitude regions of the northern and southern hemispheres.
The phenomenon is caused when electrically charged particles from space enter Earth's atmosphere and collide with molecules and gasses like oxygen and nitrogen , causing the atmospheric particles to gain energy. To return to their normal state, the particles release that energy in the form of light, according to the University of Alaska at Fairbanks, Geophysical Institute website, which tracks the phenomenon.
As Auroras form, Earth's magnetic field redirects the particles toward the poles through a process that produces a stunning display of rays, spirals and flickers that have fascinated humans for millennia. Whether hues of green, red, blue and pink dance about in the sky is due to the altitude in which the collisions occur, as well as the composition and density of the atmosphere at the time.
When Northern Lights are active, the best time to see them is between 10 p.m. and 2 a.m.
Are the Northern Lights becoming more common? This isn't the first time this year people throughout Wisconsin caught a glimpse of the Northern Lights. In May, a powerful geomagnetic storm unleashed spectacular views of the northern lights in areas of the U.S. where Auroras are seldom visible.
As the sun nears the height of its 11-year cycle in 2025, people across the world can expect more frequent and brighter Northern-Light activity due to increased electromagnetic activity.
Best places in Wisconsin to see the Northern Lights In case you want to see the lights from somewhere that isn't your porch, here are a list of places in Wisconsin that could offer some of the best views of the night sky:
Newport State Park , Ellison Bay Driftless Region, Wisconsin Harrington Beach State Park , Belgium Kettle Moraine State Forest , Eagle Kohler-Andrae State Park , Sheboygan Parnell Tower , Plymouth Rashad Alexander can be contacted at ralexander@gannett.com and 920-431-8214. Journal Sentinel reporter Clara Reid contributed to this report.

author: @dmadridistaok
title: Juan Carlos Rivero revoluciona las redes en el Real Madrid-Celta de Vigo de Copa del Rey
text:
Juan Carlos Rivero ha revolucionado este jueves las redes sociales con sus comentarios durante el Real Madrid-Celta de Vigo, partido de octavos de final de la Copa del Rey. El narrador del encuentro provocÃ³ decenas de reacciones por parte de los usuarios con su retransmisiÃ³n. El periodista espaÃ±ol acostumbra a regalar grandes momentos a los aficionados con algunos de sus gazapos a lo largo de los encuentros.
Con motivo del choque en el Santiago BernabÃ©u a las 21:30 horas, Rivero volviÃ³ a llevar la voz cantante del Real Madrid en la Copa, como ya hizo hace una semana en Cartagena ante la Deportiva Minera. El madrileÃ±o tambiÃ©n es el narrador habitual de la selecciÃ³n espaÃ±ola de fÃºtbol, habiendo relatado al completo su participaciÃ³n en la gloriosa Eurocopa de Alemania el pasado verano.
De hecho, Rivero ha tenido una semana completa, pues ya narrÃ³ este miÃ©rcoles el duelo entre Elche y AtlÃ©tico con victoria por 0-4 a favor de los madrileÃ±os. Ahora le toca narrar las andanzas del Real Madrid en esta eliminatoria de Copa ante el conjunto celeste, al que ya le ganÃ³ en BalaÃ­dos en el choque de Liga por 1-2 con goles de Kylian MbappÃ© y de Vinicius Junior.
El enfrentamiento de este jueves es bien distinto porque los blancos vienen de perder estrepitosamente en la final de la Supercopa de EspaÃ±a, disputada el pasado domingo en Yeda contra el Barcelona (2-5). Los de Carlo Ancelotti estÃ¡n obligados a ganar para salvar una buena papeleta ante la aficiÃ³n del BernabÃ©u y es Rivero el encargado de contar a los espectadores mediante la televisiÃ³n lo que ocurra en cada momento de este partido a vida o muerte (partido Ãºnico).
DÃ³nde ver el Real Madrid-Celta
RTVE fue uno de los medios de comunicaciÃ³n que se hizo con los derechos para emitir en nuestro paÃ­s algunos partidos de Copa. Este Real Madrid-Celta de los octavos del torneo se podrÃ¡ ver por televisiÃ³n en directo a travÃ©s de La 1, por lo que todos los que quieran disfrutar de este choque podrÃ¡n hacerlo mediante el ente pÃºblico en abierto y gratis.

author: Pepe MencÃ­as
title: El norovirus llega a EspaÃ±a: sÃ­ntomas, formas de contagio y cÃ³mo prevenir esta infecciÃ³n de estÃ³mago
text:
VÃ³mitos
El norovirus llega a EspaÃ±a: sÃ­ntomas, formas de contagio y cÃ³mo prevenir esta infecciÃ³n de estÃ³mago
[La gripe tensa las Urgencias de Catalunya y desbanca al covid por primera vez desde 2020](https://www.elperiodico.com/es/sanidad/20250102/epidemia-gripe-presion-urgencias-cataluna-desbanca-covid-primera-vez-desde-2020-113065459)
[Flemas: QuÃ© son, quÃ© tipos hay, quÃ© significan segÃºn su color y cÃ³mo se pueden combatir](https://www.elperiodico.com/es/salud/20250104/flemas-son-tipos-hay-significan-96820502)
Â¿QuÃ© es la â€˜extraÃ±aâ€™ enfermedad que estÃ¡ padeciendo media EspaÃ±a y afecta al estÃ³mago? / Freepik
Entre los meses de noviembre y abril, los virus proliferan y tensan las urgencias sanitarias, en cierta medida, alentados por las [Navidades y el notable aumento de las reuniones sociales](https://www.elperiodico.com/es/sanidad/20250102/epidemia-gripe-presion-urgencias-cataluna-desbanca-covid-primera-vez-desde-2020-113065459). Aunque en las prÃ³ximas semanas se espera la peor situaciÃ³n de enfermedades respiratorias, el 'norovirus' aspira a convertirse en otro problema para los centros mÃ©dicos en EspaÃ±a.
Este virus se caracteriza por episodios de diarrea, vÃ³mitos y fiebre sin previo aviso. Los sÃ­ntomas de este brote aparecen de repente, sin seÃ±ales previas, y suelen durar entre 24 y 72 horas. De momento, no hay un tratamiento especÃ­fico y la recomendaciÃ³n principal de las autoridades sanitarias es beber mucho lÃ­quido.
MÃ¡s de 90 brotes de norovirus fueron confirmados en Estados Unidos durante la primera semana de diciembre. Esta gripe estomacal, como tambiÃ©n se denomina, afecta ahora a EspaÃ±a, donde centenares de personas han acudido a urgencias por sÃ­ntomas de vÃ³mitos, diarrea, dÃ©cimas de fiebre y cefalea.
El contagio de este virus estomacal es fÃ¡cil: estar en contacto por una persona o superfÃ­cie infectada o consumir alimentos o agua contaminada. Se debe tener especial cuidado con los mariscos porque se alimentan filtrando el agua. De hecho, En Estados Unidos comenzÃ³ por el consumo de unas ostras contaminadas, que la FDA acabÃ³ retirando del mercado. Las autoridades sanitarias recomiendan lavarse las manos con agua y jabÃ³n, como mÃ­nimo, por 20 segundos para evitar el contagio.

author: globo.com
title: Rio tem tendÃªncia de aumento da transmissÃ£o da dengue
text:
Leia mais: Tarifa dos tÃ¡xis serÃ¡ reajustada a partir de segunda-feira; bandeirada passa de R$ 6 para R$ 6,10 Entenda: VÃ­deos com dicas contra desaparecimento de crianÃ§as e adolescentes serÃ£o exibidos em Ã´nibus e terminais no Rio Elaborado por tÃ©cnicos do Centro de InformaÃ§Ã£o EstratÃ©gica de VigilÃ¢ncia em SaÃºde, que compÃµe o Centro de InteligÃªncia em SaÃºde da SES-RJ (CIEVS/CIS-RJ), o levantamento deixa evidente que o estado do Rio de Janeiro mantÃ©m tendÃªncia de aumento na transmissÃ£o de casos da doenÃ§a, com circulaÃ§Ã£o bem acima do limite mÃ¡ximo esperado para o momento. O modelo de anÃ¡lise estima tambÃ©m o que deveria aparecer no sistema de informaÃ§Ã£o, mostrando a situaÃ§Ã£o epidemiolÃ³gica real dos municÃ­pios, se nÃ£o houvesse atraso nas notificaÃ§Ãµes. Dessa forma, o monitoramento permite a aÃ§Ã£o mais oportuna para reduzir o impacto da transmissÃ£o.
AlÃ©m de estarem com transmissÃ£o acima do esperado, as regiÃµes Metropolitana I e Baixada LitorÃ¢nea sÃ£o as que apresentam maior atraso das notificaÃ§Ãµes. Os municÃ­pios do Rio de Janeiro, ItaguaÃ­, Nova IguaÃ§u e Rio das Ostras sÃ£o os que apresentam maior atraso das notificaÃ§Ãµes e tendÃªncia de crescimento rÃ¡pido de casos.
Quando observado o Ã­ndice de incidÃªncia da doenÃ§a, que Ã© a relaÃ§Ã£o do nÃºmero de casos por 100 mil habitantes, oito cidades apresentam patamares elevados, acima de 200 casos / 100 mil habitantes: Itatiaia, Natividade, Italva, Resende, Rio das Ostras, Comendador Levy Gasparian, Porto Real e TrÃªs Rios.
AtÃ© terÃ§a-feira, o estado do Rio de Janeiro registrou 47.471 casos da doenÃ§a, com 2.790 internaÃ§Ãµes e 28 Ã³bitos. As informaÃ§Ãµes e o boletim completo estÃ£o disponÃ­veis no Painel Monitorar, no site da SES-RJ, no link monitorar.saude.rj.gov.br .
Confira a situaÃ§Ã£o de cada regiÃ£o
A RegiÃ£o Metropolitana I concentra o maior nÃºmero de casos - 87% deles na cidade do Rio de Janeiro -, quantidade acima do limite mÃ¡ximo esperado e importante atraso nas notificaÃ§Ãµes, reforÃ§ando tendÃªncia de alta transmissÃ£o de dengue no estado.
A Baixada LitorÃ¢nea se destaca pelo perfil de transmissÃ£o bem acima do esperado no momento, com as cidades de Rio das Ostras e SÃ£o Pedro da Aldeia com o maior volume de casos e maiores incidÃªncias da regiÃ£o. ArmaÃ§Ã£o de BÃºzios, Iguaba Grande e SÃ£o Pedro da Aldeia destacam-se pelo perfil de alta transmissÃ£o.
No Centro-Sul, a maior parte dos municÃ­pios estÃ¡ com transmissÃ£o acima do esperado, com TrÃªs Rios concentrando o maior volume de casos. Ao lado de Comendador Levy Gasparian e Sapucaia, TrÃªs Rios ocupa ainda as maiores incidÃªncias.
Na BaÃ­a de Ilha Grande, Angra dos Reis e Mangaratiba sÃ£o os municÃ­pios com o maior nÃºmero de transmissÃ£o no momento, com Angra registrando a maior concentraÃ§Ã£o de casos (90%) e a maior incidÃªncia.
No MÃ©dio ParaÃ­ba, Itatiaia, Porto Real e Quatis destacam-se pela transmissÃ£o de casos acima do esperado para o momento. Resende Ã© o municÃ­pio que estÃ¡ com maior atraso de notificaÃ§Ãµes e casos acima do esperado. Itatiaia apresenta maior incidÃªncia de todo o estado do Rio.
Na Metropolitana II, todos os municÃ­pios estÃ£o sem atraso na notificaÃ§Ã£o, exceto Rio Bonito, com pequeno atraso e com casos um pouco acima do esperado no momento. ItaboraÃ­ concentra maioria das notificaÃ§Ãµes.
Na RegiÃ£o Noroeste, quase todos os municÃ­pios estÃ£o com transmissÃ£o acima do esperado no momento. Itaperuna, Natividade e Italva concentram o maior volume de casos, sendo que Natividade e Italva estÃ£o entre as cidades com maiores incidÃªncias do estado.
No Norte Fluminense, o mesmo cenÃ¡rio de transmissÃ£o do Noroeste, sendo que Campos dos Goytacazes concentra a maioria de casos e Carapebus tem a maior incidÃªncia da regiÃ£o. Na RegiÃ£o Serrana, Cachoeiras de Macacu concentra o maior volume de casos e a maior incidÃªncia da regiÃ£o, que apresenta pequeno atraso de notificaÃ§Ãµes, sobretudo em Macuco.
Mais recente PrÃ³xima RÃ©veillon no PiscinÃ£o de Ramos terÃ¡ DJs, funkeiro Bielzin, pagodeiro Tiee e bateria da Grande Rio

author: bcoley
title: Kari-Out Introduces Plant-Based Compostable Packet - FSR magazine
text: Kari-Out, a foodservice packaging company, introduced the industryâ€™s first ever plant-based 100% compostable packet. Kari-Out CEO Paul Epstein feels strongly that the foodservice industry can do better than it has in the past. â€œWe have searched the world for a technology that allows us to protect the environment as well as the quality and shelf life of our products, and this is it.â€ Paul and his brothers, David and Adam, feel a responsibility to the next generation to make our planet a better place. â€œFor us, that means looking at new ways to shrink our footprint,â€ they say, and emphasize: â€œThese little packets are a big deal. Like an orange peel, the material protects whatâ€™s inside, naturally decomposes and returns to nature. Itâ€™s an exciting innovation and just one part of the many ways we continue to look for the newest earth-friendly solutions for our customers.â€ The new packets are TUV Certified, home compostable and provide several options to accommodate a variety of condiments, sauces and other products. Customers can choose from a clear exterior, to better see the product, or a paper exterior. All packets can be printed with logos and other product information.

author: NewsBreak Original
title: The warmest December in Mills County history
text: The popular image of an idyllic December is one of white Christmases, hot chocolate retreats, snow-capped conifers, and cozy, cold-weather activities. But not every December lives up to those expectations. Most of the continental U.S. will experience its peak winter cold weather in January and February . Officially, winter doesn't even start until Dec. 21. Across the U.S., the average December temperature from 1901-2000 was right above freezing point, at 32.68 F. Yearly temperatures can be compared to this 20th-century long-term average to find how uncommon a year's December climate was. The nation's warmest December on record was 2021, when the average temperature reached 6.66 F above the long-term average, at 39.34 F. December 2022 was closer to the previous century's average for the U.S. overall, at 33.08 F. The average temperature in Mills County, Texas from 1901-2000 was 46.8. The diverse climates of the U.S. mean residents can experience a range of holiday weather without breaking out their passports. Within the continental U.S., Monroe County, Florida, at the Southeast tip of the state, reported the highest average December temperature during the past century at 67.6 F. On the other end of the spectrum was Roseau County, Minnesota, bordering Canada, at 7.2 F. However, across both sides of the extremes, temperatures are warming. While that doesn't mean every December will be warmer than the last or the prior century's average, it does mean long-term temperature averages will continue to inch up the thermometer. When did Mills County, Texas experience its warmest December? To find out, Stacker used data from the National Centers for Environmental Information to identify the 15 Decembers with the highest average temperature since 1895. Also included is how that year's temperature compared to the 1901-2000 average. Read on to see if you lived through the warmest December in Mills County, Texas history.

author: SWR
title: Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg: Kinder, Ã„ltere und Obdachlose besonders betroffen: Hitzeschutz in BW | tagesschau.de
text:
Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg Kinder, Ã„ltere und Obdachlose besonders betroffen: Hitzeschutz in BW Stand: 03.07.2025 06:15 Uhr
Die Hitze setzt vor allem den sogenannten vulnerablen Gruppen zu. Vor allem sie sind gesundheitlich gefÃ¤hrdet. Was VerbÃ¤nde fordern und welche Hilfe es in BW gibt.
Von SWR Unter der Hitzewelle mit Temperaturen bis 40 Grad leiden viele Menschen. Sonnenbrand, Sonnenstich und Hitzschlag sind nur drei mÃ¶gliche Folgen von zu hohen Temperaturen und zu wenig FlÃ¼ssigkeit. Das kann vor allem fÃ¼r Kleinkinder oder Ã¤ltere Menschen sowie Menschen mit Vorerkrankungen eine lebensbedrohliche Belastung sein. Einer Studie des Robert Koch-Instituts zufolge starben in den beiden Sommern 2023 und 2024 rund 3.100, beziehungsweise 2.800 Menschen in Deutschland durch hohe Temperaturen.
Sozialverband VdK fordert mehr Schutz - besonders fÃ¼r vulnerable Gruppen Der Sozialverband VdK kritisiert, dass viele Pflegeeinrichtungen in Deutschland nicht ausreichend auf extreme Hitze vorbereitet seien. Laut VdK-PrÃ¤sidentin Verena Bentele heizen sich vor allem Ã¤ltere GebÃ¤ude ohne Klimaanlage schnell auf und sind daher eine Gefahr. Sie fordert bauliche MaÃŸnahmen und Schulungen fÃ¼r das Personal. Die Stadt Karlsruhe will zum Beispiel mit einem Hitzeaktionsplan in GebÃ¤uden fÃ¼r niedrigere Temperaturen sorgen. Darin vorgesehen ist unter anderem ein baulicher Hitzeschutz in Kitas und Schulen.
BÃ¼ndnis warnt vor hitzebedingten Gesundheitsgefahren In einem AktionsbÃ¼ndnis zum Schutz vor den gesundheitlichen Auswirkungen von Hitze will die LandesÃ¤rztekammer gemeinsam mit dem Gesundheitsministerium und dem Deutschen Wetterdienst mehr Menschen in der BevÃ¶lkerung fÃ¼r angemessene SchutzmaÃŸnahmen sensibilisieren. Im Sommer hilft es laut Landesregierung unter anderem, ausreichend FlÃ¼ssigkeit zu trinken und andere daran zu erinnern, RÃ¤ume tagsÃ¼ber mit Jalousien oder RolllÃ¤den abzudunkeln sowie hauptsÃ¤chlich morgens und abends im Freien zu sein.
26.06.2025
Hitze â€“ wie man sich am besten schÃ¼tzt Vor allem fÃ¼r Ã¤ltere Menschen kann lÃ¤nger anhaltende Hitze eine mitunter lebensbedrohliche Belastung sein. Wie kÃ¶nnen wir uns gesundheitlich vor den Hitzefolgen schÃ¼tzen? swr
Wohnungslosenhilfe: Medizinische und soziale Hilfen mÃ¼ssen ausgebaut werden Die Bundesarbeitsgemeinschaft Wohnungslosenhilfe fordert dagegen finanzielle Hilfe des Bundes, um Obdachlose besser vor Hitze zu schÃ¼tzen. Der nationale Hitzeschutzplan liste wohnungslose Menschen als besonders gefÃ¤hrdete Gruppe, beinhalte aber nur unverbindliche Empfehlungen und keine konkreten Umsetzungen. Neben einer sicheren Anbindung obdachloser Menschen an medizinische Versorgung brauche es kostenfreien Zugang zu Wasser, Schatten, DuschmÃ¶glichkeiten und kÃ¼hle RÃ¼ckzugsrÃ¤ume sowie immer zugÃ¤ngliche NotunterkÃ¼nfte, so GeschÃ¤ftsfÃ¼hrerin Sabine BÃ¶sing.
Wie das Sozialministerium Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg auf Anfrage mitteilt, sind aktuell rund 93.000 Menschen im Land wohnungslos und in einer staatlichen Unterbringung untergekommen. Die Dunkelziffer der Menschen, die nicht erfasst werden, kann deutlich hÃ¶her liegen. Gut ein Drittel der erfassten Wohnungslosen ist unter 18 Jahre alt.
Was sind die sogenannten vulnerablen Gruppen? Zu den vulnerablen Gruppen zÃ¤hlt die LandesÃ¤rztekammer Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg Ã¤ltere Menschen und Menschen mit Vorerkrankungen wie Herz-Kreislauf- oder Atemwegserkrankungen, Diabetes und neurologischen Erkrankungen. Aber auch Schwangere, SÃ¤uglinge, Kleinkinder, Kinder und alle, die im Freien arbeiten oder Sport treiben. AuÃŸerdem alleinstehende, sozial isolierte Menschen sowie Obdachlose und Menschen in ungÃ¼nstigen Wohnsituationen. Hilfe fÃ¼r Obdachlose: Hitzebus und KÃ¤ltestube In Stuttgart gibt es Anlaufstellen fÃ¼r Wohnungslose in der Hitze: So soll die KÃ¤ltestube der Evangelischen Gesellschaft im Sommer ein RÃ¼ckzugsort zum AbkÃ¼hlen sein. Obdachlose bekommen dort Trinkwasser, kÃ¶nnen duschen oder ein paar Stunden in klimatisierten RÃ¤umen schlafen. Insgesamt gebe es vier solcher StÃ¤tten in Stuttgart, in denen obdachlose Menschen im Sommer herunterkÃ¼hlen kÃ¶nnen, so die Evangelische Gesellschaft.
Seit drei Jahren fÃ¤hrt auÃŸerdem ein sogenannter "Hitzebus" vom Deutschen Roten Kreuz (DRK) Stationen in Stuttgart ab und bietet obdachlosen und hilfsbedÃ¼rftigen Menschen Trinkwasser und Sonnenschutz an. Der Hitzebus ist laut DRK zurzeit sehr gefragt.
